page.title: 05GREAT AMWELL-MODERN VILLAGE
page.content: {SQUARE 3712. Modern{HOUSING}:In the 1960s ten houses were built round a close to form Madgeways Close. In the early seventies Orchard House was built in the orchard of Great Amwell House to the most advanced architectural standards of the time. {ATTITUDES}:The sense of History in Gt. Amwell is very great, with a strong feeling among the villagers, as shown by the{conservation}of houses and old trees (listing). This is not perhaps surprising when one looks at the beautiful architecture, gardens & landscapes.
